Hi I'm planning to do this task https://github.com/ImperialCollegeLondon/FLT/issues/619

About allowing PRs to be marked as awaiting author

Two questions, (one of which also on the issue itself)

Firstly what should this mean for moving it between columns in the project? Does it move back to in progress? Or is it left in reviewing.

Secondly should the instructions for using this go in Contributing.md? Or is this just some magic maintainer should know about?
There's a PR for this now and I have also done the column thing (on a different branch ) if that's desired
I left two short comments on the PR.
I have also done the work to allow moving it to a different column on a different branch
(I'm at a conference all week but normal service/support will be resumed next Monday)
Looks fun, looking forward to watching the videos
